com.nokia.maps.common

Class GeoBoundingCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.common.GeoBoundingCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeoArea

    public final class GeoBoundingCircle
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeoArea
    This class defines a circular area in a geographic coordinate system. The circle is described by its radius in meters around a centre point.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeoBoundingCircle(GeoCoordinate center, double radius)
      This method initializes a new instance of GeoBoundingCircle with a specified radius and center.

      This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether a coordinate is contained within the circular area.

      This method retrieves the centre coordinate of the GeoBoundingCircle.
      double getRadius()
      This method retrieves the centre coordinate of the GeoBoundingCircle.
      boolean isEmpty()
      This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether the GeoBoundingCircle is empty.
      boolean isValid()
      This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether the circle is valid.

      This method sets the centre coordinate for the GeoBoundingCircle
      void setRadius(double radius)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoBoundingCircle

        public GeoBoundingCircle(GeoCoordinate center,
                 double radius)
        This method initializes a new instance of GeoBoundingCircle with a specified radius and center.
        Parameters:
        center - An object containing the coordinates of the centre of the circular area
        radius - the radius of the circular area in metres

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether the GeoBoundingCircle is empty. ie. radius is zero.
        Specified by:
        isEmpty in interface GeoArea
        Returns:
        true if empty, false otherwise.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether the circle is valid. If the radius is negative then it is invalid. A circle of zero radius is empty.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface GeoArea
        Returns:
        true if the area enclosed is valid, false otherwise

      • contains

        public boolean contains(GeoCoordinate coordinate)
        This method retrieves a boolean value indicating whether a coordinate is contained within the circular area.
        Specified by:
        contains in interface GeoArea
        Parameters:
        coordinate - An object containing the coordinates to be checked to see if GeoCoordinate is contained in this circle
        Returns:
        true if the coordinate is within the circle, false otherwise

      • getCenter

        public GeoCoordinate getCenter()
        This method retrieves the centre coordinate of the GeoBoundingCircle.
        Returns:
        An object containing the coordinates of the centre of the GeoBoundingCircle

      • setCenter

        public void setCenter(GeoCoordinate center)
        This method sets the centre coordinate for the GeoBoundingCircle
        Parameters:
        center - An object containing the coordinates of the centre to set

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        This method retrieves the centre coordinate of the GeoBoundingCircle.
        Returns:
        The radius of the GeoBoundingCircle in metres.

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(double radius)
        This method sets the radius for the GeoBoundingCircle
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius in metres of the GeoBoundingCircle to set
